title: Dragon Trainer Heimeringer Splash art i made

embed.description: Finally i have finished this drawing, i got a concept from Vlad Băcescu and made it into a splash art.

body: Here is a splash art i made from a Dragon Trainer Heimerdinger concept ( that wasnt made by me i only did the splash art for it ) hope you like it!
